meanings.definition: The study of the psychological motivations behind historical events.
meanings.sent1: In psychohistory, experts analyze why people made certain choices in the past.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in psychohistory explore how emotions influence historical decisions.
meanings.sent3: Studying psychohistory can help us understand why ancient civilizations collapsed.
meanings.sent4: Psychohistory delves into the hidden emotions that shape the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The impact of psychohistory on our understanding of the past is profound.

meanings.definition: A prediction of future historical events based on psychological analysis.
meanings.sent1: Experts in psychohistory use psychological insights to forecast upcoming historical developments.
meanings.sent2: The accuracy of psychohistory predictions depends on the depth of psychological understanding.
meanings.sent3: Making a psychohistory prediction about the next world leader can be intriguing.
meanings.sent4: Psychohistory offers a unique lens to anticipate future historical shifts.
meanings.sent5: The concept of psychohistory predicting events is both fascinating and challenging.
